about_the_game:
Punishments for committing crimes in ancient China differed greatly from modern ones. These punishments were designed to inflict maximum pain and psychological trauma.

Cruelty was intentional and aimed to cause maximum suffering to the victims and their families, as well as to shock and deter others from committing similar crimes.

The so-called Five Punishments (wuxing 五刑) were the capital punishments in ancient China.
According to legend either the Yellow Emperor 黃帝, or the Xia dynasty 夏 (17th - 15th cent. BCE) adopted these as they were common penalties used by the southern Miao tribes 苗.

THE GAME DISCRIPTION



Enter the heart of Ancient China and uncover the dark truths of its justice in 'Redemption of Li Wei'', where you'll bear witness to the intricacies of justice and the complexities of human nature. In this visual novel, inspired by historical facts, immerse yourself in a world where executions and punishments serve not only justice but also as instruments of power.

In this visual novel, you'll step into the shoes of Li Wei, a young woman accused of transgressions, as you navigate the labyrinth of the legal system and societal expectations.

As a player, you'll take on the role of both observer and participant, immersing yourself in a world where every decision carries weight and every action shapes the fate of Li Wei and those around her. Delve into the depths of morality and ethics as you confront the harsh realities of a society where justice is both revered and feared.

Key Features:

  • Immersive Visual Novel Experience: Dive into a rich narrative-driven gameplay experience set in Ancient China.
  • Stunning Artwork: Immerse yourself in beautifully crafted visuals that bring the world of Ancient China to life.
  • High-Quality Illustrations: Enjoy detailed depictions of emotions and events through quality illustrations.
  • Atmospheric Soundtrack: Immerse yourself in the world of the game with a captivating soundtrack that sets the mood.
  • Moral Dilemmas: Confront challenging ethical decisions that explore the complexities of human nature.
  • Historical Authenticity: Experience an accurate portrayal of Ancient Chinese culture, customs, and societal norms.

content_descriptors.notes:
Please be advised that this game contains material that may cause discomfort or offense to some players. 'Redemption of Li Wei' is intended for mature audiences and may include scenes of violence, extreme violence, sexual violence, torture, nudity, executions, and other themes that could be sensitive to certain individuals. We urge you to exercise caution when selecting this game and ensure it aligns with your personal preferences and tolerance for such content.
This game doesn't contains the following content: drug/alcohol abuse, self-harm, suicide.

The characters shown in the game are all over 20 years old.
